struct  Vps_M2mVpeRtParams
 Run time configuration structure for the VPE memory to memory driver. This needs to be passed along with process list to update any supported run time parameters. More...

 Scaler IDs in memory write back. More...
 
#define VPS_M2M_INST_VPE1   (0U)
 VPE 1 memory driver instance number.
 
#define VPS_M2M_VPE_INST_MAX   (1U)
 Maximum number of M2M VPE driver instance. Note: This is a read only macro. Don't modify the value of this macro.

 Vps_M2mVpeRtParams structure init function. More...
 

Detailed Description

This modules define APIs for memory to memory operation using VPE in VPS.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define VPS_M2M_VPE_SCALER_ID_SC0   (0U)

Scaler IDs in memory write back.

Expected to be used to get/set scaler parameters It addresses SC1.
